news_header: Discover where your tax money goes and what benefits you receive in return.
news_text: This text explains how taxes in Finland fund social security services and welfare. It highlights that the median salary in 2023 was EUR 4,112 per month, leading to an annual tax payment of approximately EUR 16,000. This amount can fund various public services, such as maternity packages and training days. The text encourages individuals to input their salary to see how their tax money is utilized.
